companyDescription: Ark Technologies Labs provides mobile wallet and API infrastructure to support the Bittensor network.
description: Leading development of mobile wallet applications for iOS and Android using React Native and Expo
Building native modules and integrations with Rust-based blockchain infrastructure
Designing and implementing GraphQL APIs for wallet operations and network interactions
Collaborating with blockchain engineers to deliver secure cryptocurrency features
achievements: Building mobile wallet infrastructure for Bittensor blockchain
Implementing secure key management and transaction signing
Developing cross-platform app with native performance
